quote: If you think you can stand looking and not touching for eight months, you're welcome to try.""""Try' being the operative word,"" he said, sighing. ""No, I can't. And I don't want to try.
quote_letters: IF YOU THINK YOU CAN STAND LOOKING AND NOT TOUCHING FOR EIGHT MONTHS YOURE WELCOME TO TRYTRY BEING THE OPERATIVE WORD HE SAID SIGHING NO I CANT AND I DONT WANT TO TRY
